text: Clarence Malcolm Simpson (26 September 1933 â€“ 7 December 2020) was a New Zealand cyclist. He represented his country at the 1952 Olympic Games. In the 1950 British Empire Games, he came sixth in the 1 km time trial. Simpson was born in Auckland. Simpson died in Takapuna on 7 December 2020 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for New Zealand Category:New Zealand cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: Malcolm Simpson
